document_data.name: The Burst Boil
document_data.mainbody: The '''Burst Boil''', which was also simply called the '''Boil''', was a tavern located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in south Zhentil Keep in the eastern section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] just north of [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Description: The building appeared to be a simply hovel with the [[goblin]] word for "rest" scratched into the front door.
document_data.Activities: The Burst Boil only allowed [[humanoid]] patrons. Any [[human]]s entering the tavern had mugs of [[ale]] thrown at their heads and were told to leave. A [[demihuman]] who entered the Burst Boil risked being stabbed and killed. A bowl of gruel here, which including flies, cost 1 [[sp]] and an ale was 5 [[cp]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The Boil was owned by a [[gnoll]] named [[Frrahr]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
